A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a Co-Host of a Star Wars Podcast (The Coruscant Pulse Podcast! Check us out! ;) ) I have very strong feelings about Star Wars. It isn't always good (like discussing The Force Awakens) but overall it is usually pretty positive.\n\nI wasn't expecting the movie we got in TLJ. I didn't like all of the decisions they made. But this movie was amazing even still. Easily the best Star Wars film we have ever seen. Did it mess with what I expected to happen? Yup. Did it ruin some of my deeply held fan theories? Of course it did. Does that make it a worse movie? Not in the slightest.
